model.implementations.components.manifests

Class ManifestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.implementations.components.manifests.ManifestFactory

  • public class ManifestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory is used to create manifests for atoms, compounds and assets.
    Author:
    Simone I. Conte "sic2@st-andrews.ac.uk"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AssetManifest createAssetManifest(Content content, GUID previous, GUID metadata, Identity identity)
      Creates an AssetManifest given the content of the asset, the GUID of a previous asset's version, the GUID of metadata associated to this asset and an identity which will be used to sign the manifest.
      static AtomManifest createAtomManifest(java.util.Collection<Location> locations)
      Creates an AtomManifest given an atom.
      static CompoundManifest createCompoundManifest(java.util.Collection<Content> contents, Identity identity)
      Creates a CompoundManifest given a collection of contents and an identity which will be used to sign the manifest.
